item.title: Jakarta Undercover (2017)
item.description: Film ini mengisahkan tentang Pras yang mengejar cita-citanya menjadi seorang wartawan dengan berangkat ke Jakarta dan berguru pada Djarwo, seorang pemimpin redaksi sebuah majalah berita. Suatu ketika Pras menyadari tulisannya dimanfaatkan kantornya untuk tujuan tertentu, terlebih setelah ia bertemu Awink, seorang penari malam, yang memperkenalkannya pada Yoga, sosok penting dalam dunia bisnis gelap Jakarta. Di sisi lain, Pras juga bertemu dengan seorang supermodel bernama Laura, yang kemudian menganggap Pras berbeda dengan kebanyakan lelaki yang ia temui di Jakarta. Tanpa disadari Pras terseret ke tengah pusaran dunia antah berantah Jakarta. Meski demikian ia tetap bertahan dengan keinginannya mengejar karier dan berusaha meyakinkan Djarwo untuk membantu menjadikan gagasannya agar jadi kenyataan.
item.actor: Oka Antara, Baim Wong, Ganindra Bimo, Tio Pakusadewo, Edo Borne, Agus Kuncoro, Richard Kyle
item.producer: Susanti Dewi, Moamar Emka, Susy Octavia Murdhani

item.title: Black Knight - The Man Who Guards Me - Episode 12
item.description: Sharon shows the articles about Dr. Moon and his lab to Soo Ho, and Soo Ho gets reminded of the fire accident. Soo Ho goes on a live show and announces that he will ask for a reinvestigation on the fire accident.
item.actor: Kim Rae Won,Shin Se Kyung,Seo Ji Hye

item.title: Jugglers - Episode 12
item.description: When Do Hee comes to Chi Won's house to return his scarf, Yoon Yi tells Chi Won not to leave her side. Yoon Yi's mother calls Chi Won out and gives him a piece of her mind. Meanwhile, Mr. Cho asks Bo Na to stab Yoon Yi in the back.
item.actor: Choi Daniel,Baek Jin Hee,Kang Hye Jung,Lee Won Keun

item.title: The Return of Superman - Episode 208
item.description: Sam meets his second son, Bentley. The whole story from the delivery to Sam and William meeting the baby for the first time is revealed. Seol A, Soo A, and Si An try some winter games for the promotion video of Pyeong Chang Olympic Winter Games.
item.actor: Lee Hwi Jae,Lee Dong Gook,Jung Hye Young,Lee Seo Jun,Ki Tae Young,Lee Beom Soo,Go Ji Yong,Yang Dong Geun,In Gyo Jin,Oh Ji Ho,Park Gun Hyung

item.title: Hospital Ship - Episode 28
item.description: Although she knows, Eun Jae hesitates to tell Hyun about Young Eun. On the other hand, Hyun's mother finds out that Young Eun has been lying to Hyun. Meanwhile, a bloody encounter between two gangs leads to trouble on the hospital ship.
item.actor: Ha Ji Won,Kang Min Hyuk,Lee Seo Won,Kim In Sik,Kwon Mina,Kim Kwang Kyu,Jung Kyung Soon

item.title: While You Were Sleeping - Episode 6
item.description: Jae Chan has a precognitive dream that shows Hong Joo announcing false insurance case in the news. To prevent the case, Jae Chan asks Hong Joo to remember the details of incident if anything happens, so that he can find her after seeing in his precognitive dream.
item.actor: Lee Jong Suk,Lee Sang Yeob,Jung Hae In,Kim Min Jae,Shin Jae Ha
item.actress: Bae Suzy,Go Sung Hee,Park Jin Joo
item.character_name: Jung Jae Chan, Nam Hong Joo, Lee Yoo Beom, Shin Hee Min

item.title: Hate to Love You - Episode 42
item.description: Geun Sup tells Haeng Ja that he has a great investment idea, but Haeng Ja tells him it’d be better if he just finds another job. Jong Hee gives a mission to both Eun Jo and In Woo to find a fine clothing within the budget of 10 dollars. Eun Jo runs into Suk Pyo while doing the mission and they have a great time.
item.actor: Lee Sung Yeol,Pyo Ye Jin,Lee Dong Hae,Han Hye Rin

item.title: The Secret of My Man - Episode 76
item.description: Ji Sup successfully reclaims his position, but a gift is sent under Ji Sup’s name instead of Jae Wook. Suh Ra threatens Hae Rim and enters Gangin as In Wook’s personal assistant. Ji Sup meets Suh Ra and gives her money out of fear and anger, but Suh Ra declares war upon him.
item.actor: Kang Se Jung,Song Chang Eui,Kim Da Hyun,Park Jung Ah

item.title: Bloom, Dal Soon - Episode 107
item.description: Tae Sung gives Nakamura a large amount of money in exchange for keeping his mouth shut about the death of Jae Ha. Yeon Hwa safely returns back to her cooking class before Dal Rae comes to check up on her. Meanwhile, Kenta is back in Korea to settle some business.
item.actor: Hong Ah Reum,Choi Jae Sung,Jo Eun Sook,Kim Young Ok,Im Ho,Kim Min Hee,Choi Chul Ho

item.title: 2 Days 1 Night - Episode 518
item.description: One Night Two Days returns after a while. To begin the 10-year anniversary special, they plan to meet the viewers overseas. The members are planning to communicate with their beloved viewers directly. Following the results of the "10-year Anniversary Awards", the members go on a mission and meet the most memorable guests from the show's history.
item.actor: Kim Jong Min,Cha Tae Hyun,Kim Joon Ho,Defconn,Jung Joon Young,Yoon Shi Yoon

item.title: My Golden Life - Episode 36
item.description: Ji An is surprised to meet Myung Hee. Ji An and Do Kyung go to the flower market together to get flowers for the wedding of Nam Goo and Hee. Ji An and Ji Soo awkwardly see each other at the wedding. Myung Hee hears from Gi Jae about what happened between Do Kyung and So Ra, and she thinks about people near Do Kyung.
item.actor: Park Si Hoo,Shin Hye Sun,Lee Tae Hwan,Seo Eun Su,Lee Da In,Lee Tae Sung,Cheon Ho Jin,Jung So Young,Choi Gwi Hwa,Park Joo Hee

item.title: Battle Trip - Episode 75
item.description: Cho Rong and Ha Young spend a meaningful time in Taiwan. They eat out at a famous restaurant in Kaohsiung where they try Taiwanese hot pot. They also visit Ai He river which is known for its beautiful view.
item.actor: Sung Si Kyung,Lee Hwi Jae,Kim Sook,San E

item.title: Immortal Songs - Episode 335
item.description: This week, the second part of the King of Kings Special is revealed. The second part features Park Ki Young, Seo Eun Kwang, Homme, Kim Tae Woo, Song Jun Ho and Kim Sang Jin, and KCM. Who will be the final winner of the King of Kings Special? Stay tuned to find out!

item.title: Sweet Enemy - Episode 78
item.description: Se Na asks for Choigo Foods’ shares in return for Dal Nim’s mother and threatens Yi Ran. Geum Sook comes to know about Byung Soo’s situation and tells Dal Nim about it. Meanwhile, Se Na tries to send Dal Nim’s mother away after getting the shares from Yi Ran.
item.actor: Park Eun Hye,Yoo Gun,Lee Jae Woo,Park Tae In

item.title: KBS Drama Awards (2017) - Part 1
item.description: In part one of the KBS Drama Awards, beloved actors who shined KBS dramas of 2017 will be given various awards. Starting from the Best New Actor and Actress Award, many aspiring actors visit the show to join and celebrate the year. Also, there are special performances.
item.actor: Song Joong Ki,Park Bo Gum,Kim Ji Won,Jun Hyun Moo

item.title: KBS Song Festival (2017) - Part 1
item.description: The first episode of the 2017 KBS Song Festival features top artists of 2017 who shine the Korean music industry with trendy and hot songs. Hosted by Chan Yeol, Irene, Jin, and Sana, part one is covered by Mamamoo, Seventeen, GFriend, Hyun A, Hwang Chi Yeul, and Wanna One.

item.title: Temperature of Love - Episode 14
item.description: Kyung and Hyun Soo go to Good Soup for lunch. After lunch, Jung Sun invites her to his home. Hyun Soo confronts him about Hong Ah and his relationship. She tells him she doesn't want to fight with Hong Ah over a man. He tells her to give up on him if that is the case. Meanwhile, Hong Ah and Jung Woo meet to continue their conversation over the possibility of signing a contract.
item.actor: Seo Hyun Jin,Yang Se Jong,Kim Jae Wook,Jo Bo Ah

item.title: Entertainment Weekly - Episode 1700
item.description: Entertainment Weekly is back with the New Year and more news. KBS held the annual Drama Awards on the last day of 2017. Meet the festive event up close where actors and actresses gathered to celebrate. Romantic news broke through as the year started too. See which couples gladly opened up about their intimate relationships.

item.title: Battle Trip Special - Episode 4
item.description: Lee Kyu Han and Kim Ki Bang are in Czech Republic. They visit St. Vitus Cathedral and Bohemian Switzerland National Park. They try Czech’s famous chimney cake and enjoy a unique beer spa. Meanwhile, Kim So Eun and Jo Bo Ah are in Hungary. They try goulash for the first time. They enjoy their night by the bridge along with some wine.

item.title: The Return of Superman Special - Episode 8
item.description: In this week’s special episode, Lo Hee and her friends get ready to enjoy Christmas. Eugene turns into Santa, but Lo Hee recognizes her as soon as she sees her. Meanwhile, Si An, Seol A, and Soo A take care of their neighbor’s dog, Da Rong. They go to the park to walk Da Rong and spend a happy day.
item.actor: Lee Hwi Jae,Lee Dong Gook,Jung Hye Young,Lee Seo Jun,Ki Tae Young,Lee Beom Soo,Go Ji Yong,Yang Dong Geun,In Gyo Jin,Oh Ji Ho,Park Gun Hyung

item.title: Music Bank - Episode 913
item.description: This week, Momoland, N.Flying, and TRCNG give their comeback perfor-mances. Monsta X, Lovelyz, and a singer with a honey-like voice, So You, also perform. Twice and EXO compete for the first place this week. Stay tuned to find out who wins the first place!

item.title: I Am Woman - Ep 10 MMA Fighter
item.description: Alia flies all the way to Sabah to meet Malaysia’s first female MMA fighter, Ann Osman. It’s not all fun and games when Alia gets a taste of the training that’s involved to become a champion. Next, Alia goes head to head with Ann in the ring but she barely survived her training circuit. Could this be her toughest challenge yet?
item.tags: VIU, VIU Originals, Iamwoman, Aliazecha, Dream, Tough, Livingadream, Dreamscometrue, Woman, Ann Osman, MMA, One Championship, fighter, martial arts, boxng, training, challenge, Sabah, academy

item.title: The Publicist - Episode 13
item.description: Julia leaves all the chaos and commotion behind and leads a new life in Japan. Finally, aware of his regrets, Rey plays all his last cards to win Julia back. Robert realizing the heated competition between Rey and himself soon takes action. Will Julia finally be able to make the decision of her life?
item.actor: Prisia Nasution, Adipati Dolken, Baim Wong
item.tags: The Publicist, Indonesian, Drama, Original, Romance

item.title: Sisters-in-law - Episode 76
item.description: Myung Ja becomes honest with Eun Byul and tells her that she never disliked her. Geum Byul goes to her in-laws’ and gets drunk with her mother-in-law. Meanwhile, Ji Ho decides to put Dong Joo through a test.
item.actor: Ham Eun Jung,Lee Joo Yeon,Kang Kyung Joon,Cha Do Jin

item.title: 2 Days 1 Night Special - Episode 9
item.description: In this week, the members of One Night Two Days go on a pep rally for the first time. They visit Cheongsan Island. They try to work on their teamwork. In order to win a meal, they have to compete against elderly ladies and staff members. Will they be able to get through the pep rally successfully?
item.actor: Kim Jong Min,Cha Tae Hyun,Kim Joon Ho,Defconn,Jung Joon Young,Yoon Shi Yoon

item.title: Running Man - Episode 370
item.description: This week, the Running Man members have a Tiger Moth Tour Truth Game. The members need to choose who is telling the truth regarding Kwang Soo and So Min's trip to Indonesia. The loser will become one step closer to experiencing the Nevis Swing.
item.actor: Yoo Jae Suk,Ha Dong Hoon,Ji Suk Jin,Song Ji Hyo,Lee Kwang Soo,Kim Jong Kook

item.title: Detective YUGAMI - Episode 10
item.description: The suspect in the case of Leucochloridium paradoxum, Yokoshima, is still alive. Yugami has made a false report, falsifying his death seven years ago. Why did he do that? Does he have something to do with the murder? The police are now closing in on Yokoshima and Yugami, but it seems that the final chapter of Yokoshima's last book is the death of a police officer.
item.actor: Tadanobu Asano,Ryunosuke Kamiki,Izumi Inamori,Takashi Nishina,Atsushi Hashimoto

item.title: Reunited Worlds - Episode 39
item.description: Dong Seok takes Gong Joo to a bus terminal and sends her off to Busan by herself. When Yoo Min and Hae Chul find this out, they chase the bus Gong Joo got on and saves her. Meanwhile, Ho Bang and Hae Sung catch Dong Seok at the airport, but he manages to run away.

item.title: The Public Enemy - Episode 9
item.description: As Inusaki's faction proposes a popular theme park along with the new port development, it seems that the popular opinion is leaning towards the new port. At the same time, there are many news reports saying Tomoko has accepted illegal donations for her campaign.

item.title: The Unit Special - Episode 1
item.description: It is a special episode of The Unit. 90 idols show their unique charms that were not aired in previous episodes. They gather to celebrate a special Christmas with the members and mentors.

item.actor: Cha Tae Hyun, Ha Jung Woo, Joo Ji Hoon, Kim Dong Wook, Do Kyung Soo

item.title: Happy Together Special - Episode 5
item.description: In this week’s special, celebrities who are strictly friends, despite their different genders, appear. Each couple talks about their friendship and other fun episodes about each other. They also bicker with other guests as well, which causes lots of laughter. Stay tuned to check out what they have prepared for us!

item.title: Children of 20th Century - Episode 1
item.description: Sa Jin Jin is a celebrity in her 30s. She is currently the most popular star, and everyone is head-over-heels for her. Despite her popularity, Jin Jin is only in love with a man named Anthony.
item.actor: Han Ye Seul,Kim Ji Suk,Lee Sang Woo,Ryu Hyun Kyung,Ahn Se Ha,Oh Sang Jin

item.title: Mr. House Husband Special - Episode 7
item.description: Seung Hyun and his daughter, Soo Bin, have a very special relationship. In this episode, the collections of episodes explain the story behind their relationship. This family always goes through ruckus just like any other family. Sometimes, Soo Bin is like a sister, a daughter and a mother to Seung Hyun.

item.title: Unni is Alive - Episode 64
item.description: Se Kyung apologizes to Eun Hyang for everything she's done. As Se Kyung's time runs out, she and Eun Hyang bond more.
item.actor: Jang Seo Hee,Oh Yoon Ah,Han Joo Hyun,Lee Ji Hoon,Kim Da Som

item.title: The Good Thieves - Episode 42
item.description: Joong Tae invites Dol Mok to his house for dinner. He prepared poison from blowfish to murder Dol Mok, but he gets poisoned instead. Joong Tae is rushed to the emergency room and Hwa Young points Dol Mok as the suspect. Meanwhile, So Joo finds out that Tae Seok is the one who killed her father.
item.actor: Ji Hyun Woo,Seo Hyun,Kim Ji Hoon,Lim Ju Eun,Shin Eun Jung,Kim Jung Tae

item.title: Mr. House Husband - Episode 34
item.description: So Yeon invites her friends and Jae Hee cooks an amazing meal at a low cost. Her friends give them advice in marriage and child care. Se Mi and her mother-in-law try to lose weight. Woo Hyuk turns out to be a hard trainer. Will their plan succeed? Meanwhile, Seung Hyun’s mother visits him in the middle of the night. His parents had a huge fight and mother decides to run away.

item.title: Yu Hui Yeol's Sketchbook - Episode 382
item.description: This week, indie idols stars visit Sketchbook. MeloMance and Paul Kim perform their special live together. Cheeze and Sunwoo JungA sing and talk about their goals. Meanwhile, the band Jannabi and We Are The Night show their unique charm to the audience.

item.title: Hello Counselor - Episode 347
item.description: Today, Su Ho and Se Hun of EXO, Kim So Hyun and Son Jun Ho, the charming couple join the show. Joining the program today are a wife who is worried about her husband’s bad eating habits and health, a son who is fed up with his mother teaching him sexual things, and a mother who is worried about her son’s bad drinking habits.

item.title: Fantastic Duo 2 - Episode 25
item.description: This week, the father of rhythm and blues, Kim Jo Han and the legendary idol singer, Kangta join Fantastic Duo 2 to find their Fantastic Duo partners. Five nominees compete with each other by performing Kim Jo Han’s song to be the Fantastic Duo of Kim Jo Han.

item.title: Happy Together - Episode 519
item.description: This week's guests will make women's hearts flutter. Actors and singers show off their charms. It's the second part of Sing My Song. Baek Z Young reveals the truth regarding the rumor on the enormous amount of profit from soundtracks. NU'EST W shares their success story.
item.actor: Yoo Jae Suk,Park Myeong Su,Jun Hyun Moo,Jo Se Ho,Uhm Hyun Kyung

item.title: MV Bank - Episode 79
item.description: For the final episode Cha Eun Woo of Astro and Binnie of Oh My Girl join Sun Geun to look back on memorable happenings in MV Bank while shooting for The Stars Are on Their Way to Work and In-depth Study. They also look back on some of the Teamwork Check and Teamwork Race featuring Astro, Gfriend, Monsta X, VIXX and BTS. They also talk about Sun Geun’s memorable interviews with the singers and his visit to music video shooting sets.
item.tags: Television, Reality, MV Bank - Episode 79, KBS, KBS Television

item.title: 1 Percent Friendship - Episode 2
item.description: Ahn Jung Hwan, a star soccer player and a famous host of various shows, meets Bae Jung Nam, a stylish model. They try their best to make friends with each other. Will the 1 percent of common ground work for their friendships?
item.actor: Jeong Hyung Don,Bae Chul Soo,Ahn Jung Hwan,Kim Jong Min,Seol Min Seok,Bae Jeong Nam

item.title: Hirugao Love Affairs in the Afternoon

container.title: K-Movies brought to you by TVN Movies

item.title: New Trial
item.description: A lawyer in debt finds new meaning to his job when he’s enlisted by a young man to clear his name after spending 10 years in prison for a crime he did not commit.
item.producer: Yoon Soo Jin, Park Sung Il, Yoon Ki Ho

item.title: A Girl At My Door
item.description: A policewoman encounters a young girl in need of help but things become more mysterious as she gets to know her.
item.producer: Lee Chang Dong, Lee Joon Dong,Kim Ji Yeon

item.title: Hide and Seek
item.description: A missing brother. Hide and seeks codes. A shocking truth for two different families and the struggle to save their families from someone who is already living inside their house.
item.actor: Son Hyun Joo,Jeon Mi Seon,Moon Jung Hee

item.title: Little Black Dress
item.description: After graduating from university a group of five close girlfriends realize that making it in the real world is no so easy and must define their own lives in ways that may forever change their friendship.
item.actress: Yoon Eun Hye,Park Han Byul,Cha Ye Ryun,Yoo In Na
item.producer: Jang Suk Bin, Jung Hyun, Kim Woo Sang, Kim Jung Bok, Ahn Su Yeon

item.title: Untouchable lawmen
item.description: A veteran criminal profiler and rookie cop are tasked with a complicated case to take down the boss of a criminal organization who appears to be untouchable, with friends in high places protecting him.

item.title: Couples
item.description: When these five hopeless people find their lives intertwining, they discover love and become couples in unexpected ways.
item.actor: Kim Joo Hyuk,Lee Si Young,Lee Yun Ji

item.title: Blood Rain
item.description: After a slew of grisly murders takes place in an isolated island village, the government sends in special investigator Wong Gyu to solve the case but he soon uncovers a myriad of hidden secrets that trace the murders back to an incident that occurred some seven years earlier.
item.actor: Cha Seung Won, Park Yong Woo, Ji Sung

item.title: Some
item.description: Close to $10 million of illegal drugs, intended to be presented as evidence in court, is stolen from the police as they are transporting it to the station. The police name as a suspect the man in charge of transporting the evidence, Section Chief Oh (Kang Shin-Il) of the violent crimes division, and an investigation begins. However, a younger colleague Kang Sung-Joo (Ko Soo) who believes that Section Chief Oh is innocent pursues another suspect in hopes of finding the criminal. In a car chase with the suspect, who is driving under the influence of drugs, there is a car crash and the suspect is killed. By tracing phone numbers on the dead man's mobile phone, Sung-joo continues to pursue the investigation, however the next suspect he follows is also killed, and the incident becomes shrouded in mystery.

item.title: The Last Princess
item.description: Princess Deokhye (Son Ye-Jin) was the last princess of Korea. Under Japanese colonial rule, she is taken to Japan as a hostage. With the era's harsh conditions, she struggles to maintain the hope of the Korean people. Jang-Han (Park Hae-Il) is a fighter for Korean independence. His mission is to bring Princess Deokhye back to South Korea and he also loves her.
item.tags: tvN Movies,Korean Movies,Son Ye Jin,Park Hae Il,Yoon Je Moon,Drama

item.title: We Are Brothers
item.description: Two brothers were separated at an orphanage. Years later, the brothers meet again and they try to find their mother.
item.tags: Korean Movies,tvN Movies,Drama,Comedy, We Are Brothers

item.title: Tazza: The High Rollers
item.description: A guy with a talent for cards makes his way into the dangerous world of underground gambling in this crime thriller from South Korea. Go-ni (Jo Seung-woo) is a small-town guy with a big appetite for gambling. Convinced he?s on a hot streak one evening during a card game, Go-ni bets his life savings on a hand of hwatu, only to lose to a crooked cardsharp. Determined to get revenge, Go-ni sets out to find the guy who cheated him and win back his money.
item.tags: tvN Movies,Korean Movies,Action, Tazza: The High Rollers

item.title: Helpless
item.description: A man searches for his fiancee who vanished without a trace just before their wedding ceremony, only to discover that she has been using someone else's identity and that everything he knows about her is fake.
item.actor: Lee Sun Kyun, Cho Seong Ha
item.actress: Kim Min Hee,Song Ha Yoon, Cha Soo Yeon
item.producer: Shin Hye Eun, Oh Ki Min

item.title: The Beast and the Beauty
item.description: A white lie makes things even more difficult for Dong-gun when his blind girlfriend regains sight after a successful operation. Will she love him for who he is?
item.tags: Korean Movies,tvN Movies,Romantic Drama, The Beast and the Beauty

item.title: Thread of Lies
item.description: "Thread of Lies" deals with the aftereffects of a suicide by a 14-year-old girl. The story follows the mother, older sister and others who knew the young girl.
item.tags: Korean Movies,tvN Movies,Drama, Thread of Lies

item.title: The Last Ride
item.description: A love story about a young couple's enduring love, which is tested when the 27 year old Sun-jin is diagnosed with a rare form of Alzheimer's disease.
item.tags: tvN Movies,Korean Movies,Ryu Deok Hwan,An Jae Hong,Kim Dong Young,Comedy

item.title: The Happy Life
item.description: Three middle-aged men, facing a personal crisis of their own, stumble into something that they have secretly missed a rock band.
item.actor: Jang Keun Suk,Jung Jin Young,Kim Yun Seok, Kim Sang Ho
item.actress: Kim Ho Jung, Go Ah Sung
item.musicdirector: Bang Jun Seok, Lee Byung Hoon

item.title: Wide Awake
item.description: A young boy traumatized after experiencing anesthesia awareness during his heart surgery winds up on a killing spree 25 years later.

item.title: Bleak Night
item.description: A grieving father seeks to understand the circumstances that led his teenage son, Ki-tae to commit suicide. The discovery of a photo prompts him to seek out his friends find out what really happened between them.
item.actor: Lee Je Hoon, Seo Jun Young, Park Jung Min, Cho Seung Ha
item.producer: Yoon Sung Hyun, Kim Seung Jun, Park Ki Young, Jang Hyun Soo

item.title: Il Mare
item.description: In the year 1999, a young woman leaves her quaint house on the sea and returns to the city, leaving behind in the mailbox a card for the next owner, with instructions to forward any mail of hers to the new address. In the year 1997, a young jaded architect moves into the same house...and finds the letter. His reply, which he slips into the mailbox, finds its way to her, beginning a parallel-time love story separated by a span of two years.

item.title: May 18
item.description: The story of events leading up to the 1980 Gwangju massacre in South Korea when thousands of students and protesters were killed by armed troops during an anti-government demonstration.

item.title: Legend Of The Fist
item.description: Seven years after the apparent death of Chen Zhen, who was shot after discovering who was responsible for his teacher's death (Huo Yuanjia) in Japanese-occupied Shanghai. A mysterious stranger arrives from overseas and befriends a local mafia boss. That man is a disguised Chen Zhen, who intends to infiltrate the mob when they form an alliance with the Japanese. Disguising himself as a caped fighter by night, Chen intends to take out everyone involved as well as get his hands on an assassination list prepared by the Japanese.
item.tags: Movie, Full Movie, Legend Of The Fist, Media Asia

item.title: Initial D
item.description: After winning his first competition, Takumi focuses his attention on drift racing, a sport he has unknowingly perfected while delivering tofu in his father's Toyota AE86.
item.tags: Movie, Full Movie, Initial D, Media Asia

item.title: A Chinese Odyssey - Part Two
item.description: The convoluted continuation of the adventures of the time-traveling, now-human Monkey King, who attempts to fulfill his divine destiny.
item.tags: Movie, Full Movie, A Chinese Odyssey - Part Two, Media Asia, Media Asia Movie

item.title: Fire Of Conscience
item.description: Centers on Captain Manfred who is caught in the line of fire between high levels of corruption and malice. He must solve a brutal murder to prove his partner's innocence and unearth the truth behind Hong Kong's police force. The investigation brings him to an unlikely collaboration with sly, man-of-the-world Inspector Kee from the Narcotics Bureau, whose motives are not what they seem.

item.title: The Sniper
item.description: A top sharpshooter (Richie Jen) must save his daughter from a former colleague (Huang Xiaoming) who is out for revenge.
item.tags: Movie, Full Movie, The Sniper, Media Asia

item.title: Gen-Y Cops
item.description: An FBI agent (Stephen Fung) and his team search for arms dealers after they steal a prototype of a U.S. attack robot.

item.title: A Chinese Odyssey - Part One
item.description: Fantasy adventure about the arrival of Buddhism in China. When the Goddess of Happiness tosses the Longevity Monk and his disciples out of heaven (because the Monkey King tried to attain immortality), the Monkey King is reincarnated as the Joker. He now spends his time chasing two jealous women. When one of them is dying, the Joker goes back in time in an attempt to save her.
item.tags: Movie, Full Movie, A Chinese Odyssey - Part One, Media Asia, Media Asia Movie

item.title: The Banquet
item.description: A loose adaptation of Hamlet, "The Night Banquet" is set in an empire in chaos. The Emperor, the Empress, the Crown Prince, the Minister and the General all have their own enemies they would like to finish off at a night banquet.
item.tags: Movie, Full Movie, The Banquet, Media Asia

item.title: City Of Life And Death
item.description: In 1937, Japan occupied Nanjing, the Chinese capital. There was a battle and subsequent atrocities against the inhabitants, especially those who took refuge in the International Security Zone.
item.tags: Movie, Full Movie, City Of Life And Death, Media Asia

item.title: Exiled
item.description: A friendship is formed between an ex-gangster, and two groups of hitmen - those who want to protect him and those who were sent to kill him.

item.title: Vengeance
item.description: A French chef swears revenge after a violent attack on his daughter's family in Hong Kong, during which her husband and her two children are murdered. To help him find the killers, he hires three local hit-men working for the mafia.

item.title: A World Without Thieves
item.description: A con-team couple (Andy Lau & Rene Liu) head west after taking a city businessman for his BMW. But an encounter with a naive young carpenter travelling home with his life savings challenges their fate as thieves.

item.title: Seoul Raiders

King Of Mask Singer
item.description: The King of Mask Singer is a popular South Korean singing competition show, where contestants wear masks to hide their identity. The purpose of the mask is to eradicate the prejudice that people often have of singers. Every week, the judges and the audience must vote on who will become the next King of Mask Singer.

item.title: Prem Ratan Dhan Payo

What follows is a tale of revenge, emotion, drama, jealousy, treason, loyalty, love and payback.

item.description: A story based in the city of Ghaziabad, where a gang war breaks between two rival groups led by Satbir Singh and Fauji. Thakur Pritam Singh, a corrupt police officer, is transferred to the city to handle the situation. He ends up playing mind games with the two warring gangs, pitting them against each other. Fauji joins hands with Chairman’s arch rival Rashid to kill Satbir. What unfolds is a story with the elements of suspicion, betrayal, greed and politics mixed together. Who will have the final laugh?

item.title: Dharmathin Thalaivan
item.description: A man loses his soft-spoken, loving elder brother in a fight and gives up his violent ways. One day, he meets his brother's look-alike, a ruffian, and begins to treat him just like his elder brother.

item.title: Bagavathi
item.description: Tea vendor, Bhagvathi has big dreams for his brother Guna. But, Guna is killed by Priya's father, who is unaware of his daughter's pregnancy. Now, it is up to Bhagvathi to save his brother's child.

item.description: The protagonist is a man who lives a lavish life, is a spendthrift and has a cavalier attitude towards life. This bothers his father and he decides to send him to his friend's village to work for him.

item.title: Vaanavil
item.description: Surya, Prakash and Priya are three IAS aspirants. Surya and Priya fall in love and Prakash, her secret admirer, silently becomes an enemy posing as a friend. He plots to get rid of Surya.

item.title: Manamagalae Vaa
item.description: In order to resolve her sister, Geetha's marital problems, Chitra decides to marry Geetha's bachelor brother-in-law, Balu. She disguises herself as a village belle, Rajathi and enters Balu's life.

item.title: Nenjangal
item.description: A couple loses their daughter, Bala to a kidnapper. She escapes from him and is rescued by a kind couple. While the attempts are made to re-unite, the kidnapper too closes in on them.

item.title: Netrikkan
item.description: Businessman Chakravarthy is a big time womaniser. When his son tries to talk some sense into him, he leaves for Hong Kong, where he ends up raping a young woman. Upon his return, he gets a big shock.

item.title: Nilakkaalam
item.description: Nila's mother, an actress, is separated from her husband. Nila has all the comforts but no friends. She befriends two boys who work in a garage. They plan a picnic that may change everything, forever.

item.title: Oru Veedu Iru Vasal
item.description: In a small town, a married musician impregnates the maid, leading to disastrous consequences. In the city, a woman works as an extra in the films to raise her boy with the luxuries that she never got.

item.title: Parvaiyin Marupakkam
item.description: Vijay witnesses his parents being burnt alive by some temple thieves. The incident leaves a deep scar on his mind because his sister Geetha loses her eyesight at the same time. Vijay and Geetha are brought up by his father's friend Peter who is a hypnotist. As Vijay grows up, he also masters this art with the aim of extinguishing the fire of revenge that is still burning within him. Vijay plans to attack his parent's murderers Vishwanath and Shankar. He decides to destroy Vishwanth's family of five children. But in the meantime, he falls in love with Vishwanath's daughter Chitra who is a lawyer. Will Vijay bring the criminals to book in a lawful manner or will he continue his assault on the family?

item.title: Pithamagan
item.description: Chittan, a social outcast, has grown up in a cemetery. A drug dealer finds him a job in a cannabis farm. In prison, he meets a conman, Shakti. This friendship transforms him from his stony existence.
